ValidationRule.description: OPSSYS-1150 Prevents users from manually updating account status to: Negotiation Partnership Execution Active & Revenue Generating
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator' && $Permission.Override_Validation = FALSE && ISCHANGED(Account_Status__c) && RecordType.Id = "01269000000RZuMAAW" && (ISPICKVAL(Account_Status__c, "Negotiation") || ISPICKVAL(Account_Status__c, "Partnership Execution") || ISPICKVAL(Account_Status__c, "Active & Revenue Generating"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This status can only be automatically set by the opportunity stage
